metaTags.metaDescription: This is a generic landing page as an example

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

content.value:
Effective On: 20th of April, 2023
Cloudflare is pleased to offer eligible prospects with an opportunity to receive a gift if they complete a Discovery Session, as defined below.  These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") are additional and supplemental terms and conditions that apply to your participation in the limited time Meeting Offer Promotion ("Promotion") and constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Cloudflare. PROMOTION IS VOID WHERE PROHIBITED.
Eligibility.  Promotion is open to Cloudflare prospects (i) who are the above of the age of majority in the following countries:  Malta, Cyprus, Sweden, Germany, Spain, Italy and France and (ii) who watch/complete a "Discovery Session," which is a 30 min meeting with one of our specialists.  Officers, employees, and family members of any government entity or any department, agency or instrumentality thereof and persons acting for or on behalf of any such government, department, agency, or instrumentality, are not eligible for the gift. Limit: one entry per eligible participant.  Participants who create multiple accounts and/or have multiple emails associated with the same individual will be entitled to only one gift, regardless of having additional email accounts or accounts with Cloudflare.  Use of automated means to participate or create multiple accounts are prohibited.
Timing:  This offer runs from 12:00 AM GMT on April 20, 2023, until the earlier of (a) when 200 participants complete a Discovery Session or (b) 11:59 PM GMT on April 20, 2024 ("Term").

Gift: Each eligible participant that completes the Discovery Session will receive anUS$75 e-gift voucher equivalent in their currency  WHILE SUPPLIES LAST.  LIMIT ONE GIFT PER ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANT. Delivery timing and exact model of the complimentary gift are subject to suppliers' availability of the products.  If the gifts become unavailable during the Term, Sponsor reserves the right to award a gift of equal or greater value. 

Redeem Your Gift:  Eligible participants can redeem their gift by providing their email address and mailing address upon completion of the Discovery Session.  Participants who do not provide their mailing address may not receive a gift. 

Additional Program Rules and Regulations:  Both the Promotion and the Discovery Session are subject to Cloudflare's privacy policy (cloudflare.com/privacypolicy) and Cloudflare's Terms of Use (https://www.cloudflare.com/website-terms). BY PARTICIPATING, YOU AGREE TO RECEIVE PROMOTIONAL EMAILS FROM CLOUDFLARE. You may always opt-out or unsubscribe from these emails.
Right to Modify/Terminate:  Cloudflare may change or discontinue this offer at any time without notice. Void where prohibited or restricted by law. Please obtain the necessary approval from your organization before accepting any item of value from Cloudflare, and the recipient is solely responsible for reporting and paying any applicable taxes. Other restrictions apply.

Trademarks referred to on this page are the property of their respective owners. Amazon, Dorothy Perkins, Boohoo Man, The Wellness Card, Healthy Mind Club, Sainsbury's, Rituals UK, Cote Brasserie, Google Play Store, Virgin Experience Days, John Lewis and Partners, Currys PC World, Odeon, Nike, The White Company, Habitat, Hotels.com, TK Maxx, Homesense, Eurostar, The Body Shop, Amazon, Decathlon, Zalando, Just Eat, Ticketmaster UK are not sponsors of this promotion. 

Sponsor:  Cloudflare, Inc. located at 101 Townsend St., San Francisco, CA 94107 is  the Sponsor of this promotion.
